item.description:
We'll start our winter skill shares with a workshop on hand carding and spinning fleece using a drop spindle!

It's a simple technique using simple tools to make yarn from a variety of materials. In this case the material will be alpaca fleece, though participants are encouraged to bring along other fibers for experimentation and discussion.

Thanks to Iris Weaver who has generously offered to lead this workshop and share some of her fiber art skills!

The Basics:
Noon- Meet and greet and visit the alpacas!
12:15- Review the tools and start carding and spinning
3:00- Wrap up

Please bring:
A snack or beverage to share
Interesting fibers that you might like to spin
Carding combs or drop spindles if you have them
item.how_to_find_us: Directions will be sent to participants
item.name: Raw Fleece to Yarn
